wikistories-extensionname: Text for the name of the project
wikistories-extensiondesc: Text for the general project description
wikistories-hooks-createstory: Text for creating a story button used in the Wikipedia article view header
wikistories-imagesearch-inputlabel: Text used for the search bar label in the Search view
wikistories-story-goto-publish: Text for a button in the Story view to continue to publish step
wikistories-story-edittext: Text used for an edit button in the CurrentFrame view
wikistories-imageattribution-author-unkn: Text used in the ImageAttribution component when the image author is unknown
wikistories-article-back: Text used for a back button in the Article view
wikistories-article-cancelselection: Text for cancel button used in the Article view
wikistories-article-loading: Text used for a header in the Article view as the article loads
wikistories-article-usetext: Text used for a button in the Article view
wikistories-navigator-next: Text for a button in the Navigator component to continue to next step
